title: Please help identify this font (BBC Radio)
content:
From the BBC radio web site at [www.bbc.co.uk/radio](http://web.archive.org/web/20070715030014/http:/www.bbc.co.uk/radio "www.bbc.co.uk/radio")

Thanks in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070715030014im_/http:/typophile.com/files/radio_4760.jpg)

 [‹ (x) New Good Housekeeping serif headlines - H&FJ Chronicle {David, Marc O}](http://web.archive.org/web/20070715030014/http:/typophile.com/node/35086 "Go to previous forum topic") [Do you know the typeface to this logo? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070715030014/http:/typophile.com/node/35108 "Go to next forum topic")
author: banacek7

comments.content: Definitely Chalet. A mixture, though. That “a” is from Chalet New York 1970, for example.
The way the lowest curve joins the exit stroke is too sloppy to be House. I’d say someone started with some thing and modified the a. Although using House would be a better alternative. :^\>
